## vela cap install

Install capability into cluster

### Synopsis

Install capability into cluster

```
vela cap install <center>/<name> [flags]
```

### Examples

```
vela cap install mycenter/route
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help           help for install
  -t, --token string   Github Repo token
```

```

```
